column5: I just recieved an e-mail that the smelts are running on Nippissing, I'm not smelting this year, have to get up to early for work.
We were just talking about you in chat,Joyce.Drop by if you have a minute  Joe
Coming back to Northern Ontario after a very long absence,,,do you know where to go smelt fishing off of Nipissing?
I didn't even know they had legs            running              legs          oh never mind.....lol

What ice??  I know they come up the Little Sturgeon river, other than that I don't know where. My buddy went out last night and said they are just starting to run. He got some but the numbers weren't great.
